prints.title: RADIO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED FOR BROADCAST THIS WEEK
RADIO PROGRAMS SCHEDULED FOR THE CURRENT WEEK New York

synopses.synopsis: Richard Gump, a real-life San Francisco importer, became the prototype for Gregory Hood, serving also as a consultant 'whenever they get stuck on a bit of importing business.' The artifacts found by Hood and his pal Sandy in the stories usually had intriguing histories and were invariably linked to some present-day mystery. - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning

Mystery in a Chicago hotel lobby) [show moves to Mondays, A
Calif. case, 'eternal triangle', goes fishing and catches a murderer, A
Poor little rich girl who's to receive only $50,000 from her father's estate
One of GH's own steamships backgrounds story of Oriental murder & intrigue
GH & Sandy become lost in a fog; strange woman; case of mistaken identity
Wife's lying testimony; sends innocent man to jail
Murder, a swindle, a horse race, A
GH in San Francisco, car sideswiped, 6 gunshots
Two-timing blonde; candle burning; death plot
Goes to LA to identify a piece of Chinese porcelain - with Erskine Johnson
GH is enroute to Alaska; meets an old flame
Vacation in Las Vegas; eternal triangle; murder
Old girlfriend asks GH's help to recover letters
Innocent boy convicted of murder, GH insists he's innocent
Involved in eternal triangle of wife, secretary, and husband leading to murder
One hundred million dollar jewel theft
Jack Bailey guest stars as himself
GH selects a cab which already contains a lucious blonde with murder in her heart
Invite to try out LA Examiner's new radio car plummets him into murder robbery, joins forces w a countess
Lawyer who could fix anything except a way to save his own life
In a marriage maze; attends a wedding reception; murder & blackmail
Becomes a delivery boy for a beautiful girl - she is found murdered the next day
Libel and the murder of a managing editor
Haunted house, a missing diamond, man w 2 bullet holes dies in GH's office, man's wife seeks GH's aid, A
Involved in a situation facing a former Golden Glove champion
